(with Honours) in Computer Science (USTHB, Algeria) Engineering Computer Science and Engineering Follow me Follow me I am a Senior Lecturer at the School of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE) at the University of New South Wales (UNSW). I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from UNSW. I also hold a M.Sc. and a B.Sc. (with Honours) both in Computer Science from the University of Science and Technology Houari Boumediene (USTHB), Algeria. Prior to joining UNSW, I held Lecturer positions at Federation University, Victoria University, University of New England, Central Queensland University, and USTHB (Algeria).
